title: (Skin) Pool Party Draven
body:
http://i.imgur.com/vMtrlch.png[/img]

Price: 975

Hope you like it!

replies.body: It's sad that you would waste your time creating that skin.
This post is hilarious, because the skin is a thing now. Such haters. I think it's a great idea. And apparently Riot did too.

*If* there should be a Pool Party Draven skin, you have done a poor job of arguing for its existence. A skin concept should emphasise the common features of the champion and the theme, and this does not.
That's not even a good skin idea, let alone the photo.
No offense but honestly people should just stop with the pool party 'ideas', they are unoriginal and LoL already has a 5 man pool party team.

Why are they unoriginal? 

But thx for the comment.

Because we have a 5 man team and don't need anymore, your reading skills are impeccable.

Not to mention the skin idea looks like ass.

I understand that they already have a 5 man team, but why is it unoriginal?

And dang it was just a question, no need to overreact.
Do you understand the word original?
Yeah! but why do you think it's unoriginal if i thought of it?

unoriginal
ʌnəˈrɪdʒɪn(ə)l/Submit
adjective
adjective: unoriginal
lacking originality; derivative.

Your idea is derived from the already existing pool party skins, therefore considered unoriginal and essentially plagiarism.

plagiarism
ˈpleɪdʒərɪz(ə)m/Submit
noun
the practice of taking someone else's work or ideas and passing them off as one's own.

If something isn't original, then it's unoriginal.

Your idea is derivative of the pool party skins, therefore unoriginal.
